chapters.title: Chapter 13: The Bowl of the Winds
chapters.info: Adeleas Namelle, p. 256 (373)—Aes Sedai of the Brown Ajah, one of two Aes Sedai who went into voluntary retreat many years ago to Tifan's Well, a village located in the grassy plains of Arafel along with her sister Vandene. Their goal was some day to write the complete history of the World since the Breaking, and some even before that. She is now in Ebou Dar with Elayne and Nynaeve. Mat can't tell Adeleas and Vandene apart. See also Namelle, Vandene.
